summary: Experienced Project Manager with a demonstrated history of working in the information technology and services industry. Skilled in Communication, Leadership, Project Management, Agile & Waterfall Methodologies, and Scrum. Strong program and project management professional with a Bachelor of Engineering - BE focused in Electrical, Electronic and Communications Engineering Technology/Technician

school.name: Sant Gadge Baba Amravati University, Amravati

education.field_of_study: Electrical, Electronic and Communications Engineering Technology/Technician

certifications.name: Six Sigma Yellow Belt
certifications.authority: 6sigmastudy -  The global certification body for six sigma certifications

company.name: 6sigmastudy -  The global certification body for six sigma certifications

certifications.name: Scrum Fundamentals Certified (SFC)
certifications.authority: SCRUMstudy - Accreditation Body for Scrum and Agile

profile_positions.description:
Working as a Project Manager in the Banking and Financial Services Practice of Cognizant Technology Solutions.

Good exposure in Customer communication, Leadership skills, good understanding of ITIL quality practices and experience in working with cross culture customers (UK, Nordics, USA, APAC). Strong problem solving, analytical, decision making capacity and good team player.


Areas of Expertise
•	Project management methodologies like SCRUM, Agile, Kanban, waterfall
•	Service delivery Management 
•	Large scale delivery management and Project management 
•	Self-starter with an excellent balance of organizational, strategic management and execution skills, managing multiple priorities in a timely manner
•	ITIL Process Design, Implementation & improvement 
•	People management
•	Automation implementation 
•	Cloud computing (Office 365) and AWS
•	Exchange online and On-premise 
•	Hands on tools like ServiceNow, JIRA, Confluence, SharePoint
profile_positions.title: Project Manager

profile_positions.description:
•	Managing the entire product line life cycle from strategic planning to tactical activities by using apt  project management methodology like SCRUM, Agile, Kanban and waterfall
•	Responsible for coordinating with the client/account managers for generating product requirements; creating statement of work & determining other specifications needed to pass on to the technical team. 
•	Taken complete ownership in creating production timetables, project schedules and managing and tracking the overall project.  
•	Ensuring that all projects are delivered on-time, within scope and within budget
•	Using appropriate verification techniques to manage changes in project scope, schedule, and costs
•	Ensures timely status reporting, arranging and coordinates meetings with developers and other teams across the globe as needed
•	Working closely with teams to coordinate development + test efforts
•	Managing reviews and approvals for all maintenance and development initiatives
•	Measuring project performance using appropriate systems, tools and techniques
•	Managing the relationship with the client and all stakeholders
•	Ensure resource availability and allocation
•	Guiding, mentoring, and motivating the team to get the work delivered on time.
•	Daily, weekly, and monthly review with the team to identify the challenges and the risk involved.
•	Have hands on tools like ServiceNow, Jira, Confluence, Sharepoint, MPP
•	Handled projects: Tool integration, Company migration and set up, Automation project using tools like Ansible and Ayehu, IT infrastructure, network implementation, software application deployments etc
profile_positions.title: Project Manager

profile_positions.description:
•	Being a point of escalation for all customer service issues.
•	Ensuring consistently high levels of customer excellence at all times
•	Acting on customer feedback.
•	Motivating customers to use the company's services more
•	Developing strong links to internal and external stakeholders.
•	Providing clear leadership and direction to the customer service team daily.
•	Inspiring and leading customer service teams.
•	Promoting a hardworking, successful, and pleasant team environment
•	Actively identifying areas where processes and systems can be improved so that costs can be save or revenue increased.
profile_positions.title: Service Delivery Manager

profile_positions.description:
•	As a Technical Lead, we help our Enterprise customers/Education Universities to Deploy, Configure, Troubleshoot the below Components.
o	Exchange Online/On-Prem
o	Active directory Federation Services
o	Directory Synchronization
o	Outlook 2010/2013
•	Provide assistance or help them migrate over from BPOS, On-Premise Exch 2003, 2007 & 2010, Lotus Notes, Google Apps, 3rd Party Hosted providers like Rackspace, GoDaddy to Office 365 and resolve any issue they may encounter while doing so.
•	Also help Users migrate their Public Folders from On-Prem Exchange to Exchange Online (W15)
•	Proficient in providing Pre-requirements, Recommendations and act as a consultant when required for our Enterprise customers during  Cut-Over, Staged, IMAP and Remote Migrations (Hybrid Deployment).
•	Troubleshoot Mail flow, Free/Busy, Mailbox Move failures, Hybrid Configuration wizard failures in a logical/systematic manner to ensure a faster resolution and a satisfied customer.
•	As a Microsoft Office specialist, we troubleshoot issues with MS Office Installation, Outlook Connectivity to Exchange.
•	Assist customers regarding general office 365 administration and user management. 
•	Hands-on experience of working on Exchange Online, Exchange 2010, 2007 server and Active Directory.
profile_positions.title: Technical Lead Microsoft Office 365
